storyInfo: A Catastrophe looms. The Doctor steps onto the bridge, as if guided by prophecy, to lead Rhodes Island through the crisis. Kal'tsit determines that though the Doctor has lost most episodic memory, a basic understanding of the nature of Originium still remains.

attributes.content: 4:11 P.M. \ Overcast, Visibility: 10 km
Rhodes Island Landship, Medical Cabin
Remove the electrodes.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: What

attributes.content: No new developments.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: You'll feel better after a quick rest.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, I've scanned your brain seven times over the past month or so, and the results are always the same.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: There's nothing wrong with your medial temporal lobe, and the neurons in other brain areas are as active as they are in most young people.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Meaning you don't need to come to Medical for these unpleasant tests so often.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: Then, what

attributes.content: There's no doubt that you've lost a lot of your memory. Even someone like you wouldn't be able to manipulate the results.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Those memories are episodic, chiefly concerning the subjective awareness of your identity, and even more so about all your experiences before you fell asleep in the Chernobog sarcophagus.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: In contrast, your procedural memory has recovered extremely quickly.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: From my reports or Amiya's and Dobermann's observations, this conclusion is clear.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Your ability to command, as exhibited during the Chernobog incident, is not significantly worse than before.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: Why would this happen?;......;In other words, I

attributes.content: There are many reasons for memory loss. Some are force majeure, others are subjective.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Medical testing can only rule out qualitative pathological changes.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Of course, you don't make as much noise as you used to.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Considering your language center has not been damaged, I can only guess that the deprivation of episodic memory has caused some changes in your personality.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: To Rhodes Island, you are far more than just 'useful.'
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Even if you truly lost all your memories and become an ignorant bystander, Amiya would not have regretted saving you, and there will always be a place for you at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: In any case, I believe that the skills you possess will play just as key a role as they did in the past.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: I want to be able to help you.;I want to be able to help Amiya.

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: And I've seen how hard you've been working.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: After leaving Lungmen, we've been making our way through the wastelands for some time. The operators need an opportunity to rest, Amiya in particular.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Likewise, you also need a chance to catch your breath, don't you?
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: I just want some time to adjust.;......;I don

attributes.content: With PRTS to help you, it won't take long for you to adapt to your work at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: However, I don't want you to push yourself.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Rhodes Island is not the only thing that has just emerged from a terrible disaster. You have as well, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Your physical indicators have more or less returned to normal, but your memory is still damaged, and your mental state is unstable.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: As a patient, overwork can only harm you.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: You

attributes.content: Me? I appreciate your concern.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Though I can't say I'm used to Oripathy, I can assure you that I'm the last person you should worry about.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Amiya knows you're concerned about her, and she's been paying more attention to her health lately.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I have no choice but to admit, there are some areas in which your words hold more weight than mine.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, in the span of one short month, you've taken over the staffing of several departments on this ship.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: In addition, I've seen you reviewing past battles together with combat operators to further explore the possibilities of tactical optimization.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: You've even been reading during this entire examination. Are you looking at the briefing submitted by the new operator who just reported in a few days ago?
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Furthermore, I've seen your notes.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Those records about even the most trivial of the operators' details, those flashes of tactical inspiration...
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Those calculations for determining Rhodes Island's business efficiency, and even those scrawls that I can't make sense of. They are all evidence of your commitment to your duty.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Although most of these tasks can be completed with the assistance of PRTS, I think this is your preferred method.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: It

attributes.content: As the density of your notes increases, your cognition also improves.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: PRTS is just a tool. Avoiding overreliance on tools is a good working habit.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: So that was a complaint? I would rather take those words as a compliment.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: All of your abilities are recovering rapidly, not only due to the retention of your procedural memory, but also due to your extraordinary efforts.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Conscious exercise will help your brain return more quickly to your pre-comatose state, and may even bring back your memory faster than expected.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: Do you want me to recover as quickly as possible?

attributes.content: I am your doctor. There's not a doctor out there who does not wish for the quick recovery of her patient.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: That said, if you end up collapsing due to overwork, you'll disrupt Amiya's condition as well.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: Are you only concerned about Amiya?;......;I see. You do care about me.

attributes.content: These sentiments of yours that occasionally leak through are quite unlike the past you. While this is rather intriguing, if I am the object of your feelings, let's just say we've no need of that.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I've told you many times over that ensuring your physical and mental well-being has always been one of my duties.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: So, yes, even here, I still care about you. Even without a battle.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: It

attributes.content: Today's exam is over.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: As I said, you don't need to report back here at the same time next week.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: The regular morning and evening check-ups will continue for a while. Lancet-2 will look after you for me.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: If we ever find that your physical condition does not support your continued work, you must immediately return to Medical.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: As for now, you may return to your work, Doctor.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: 4:32 P.M. \ Overcast, Visibility: 7 km
Rhodes Island Landship, Hallway outside the bridge
Earthspirit? What brings you here?
attributes.name: Navigator A

attributes.content: I've updated the geological monitoring report I submitted this morning.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: You needed to make an adjustment so soon? That's unlike you.
attributes.name: Navigator A

attributes.content: The numbers changed quickly. Made me miss my afternoon nap.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: Forward the report to your team leader. My recommendations are at the bottom.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: Sure. Strong winds warning, is it?
attributes.name: Navigator A

attributes.content: That's no problem. The Engineering Department strengthened the storm shutters two days in advance, and Logistics notified everyone to stay away from the at-risk deck areas.
attributes.name: Navigator A

attributes.content: That's not all. Keep reading.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: Huh... There might be a strong windstorm ahead of our route? Should we slow down or make a detour?
attributes.name: Navigator A

attributes.content: How dangerous is this windstorm you're talking about here?
attributes.name: Navigator A

attributes.content: I don't know.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: I looked at anomalies in the data and made my best call. All I know for sure is there's more than one cyclone forming ahead, and it's far more intense than anyone would expect.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: Sounds pretty vague.
attributes.name: Navigator A

attributes.content: We set our route a month ago, it's already been approved. We're looking at a big mess if we change it on the fly.
attributes.name: Navigator A

attributes.content: You were in that meeting, right? We chose the route for its super low risk profile. Over the last decade, caravans from Lungmen to Leithanien have been back and forth over this route dozens of times.
attributes.name: Navigator A

attributes.content: Yes. In theory, we've avoided the Catastrophe-prone areas, and the probability of encountering danger is low.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: But you're also not sure?
attributes.name: Navigator A

attributes.content: The bosses want us as far away from Ursus and Lungmen as soon as possible.
attributes.name: Navigator A

attributes.content: Whatever... I just needed to make sure you got my warning.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: Deciding what to do with it is not in my job description. That's up to you.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: Settle down, Earthspirit, we've got protocols. I'll notify the team leader, and we'll discuss...
attributes.name: Navigator A

attributes.options: There

attributes.content: Huh, Doctor?! Why are you here?
attributes.name: Navigator A

attributes.content: Shouldn't you be in your office?
attributes.name: Navigator A

attributes.options: I was going up onto the bridge.

attributes.content: Now that's some coincidence...
attributes.name: Navigator A

attributes.content: If you're taking the report, are you going to explain the situation to our team leader in person?
attributes.name: Navigator A

attributes.options: The windstorm is right in front of us. He

attributes.content: What? It's that serious? Well that's not good...
attributes.name: Navigator A

attributes.content: Doctor, you believe me?
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.options: I believe in reality.;I believe my operators.

attributes.content: Then I'll go to the bridge with you. I'll continue to observe the situation in real time and report to you and Amiya.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.options: Good. That

attributes.content: This is within the scope of my duties.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: 4:39 P.M. \ Overcast, Visibility: 4 km
Rhodes Island Landship, Bridge
Warning, the wind speed is increasing rapidly!
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: At these numbers, our visibility's going to fall under one kilometer within a few minutes!
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: Did you turn on the assisted driving function for sandstorm mode?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We've had it on for a while, it was part of the itinerary.
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: But Amiya, this might not be an ordinary sandstorm...
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: My god!
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: What is it, Pavel?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sensors detecting thunderstorm clouds ahead!
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: Open the PA, tell the whole ship that Rhodes Island will pass through a thunderstorm shortly, and raise the alert level by one!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Central command personnel, slow us down right now!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ugh... we're rocking a lot...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What's the situation?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The pressure on the hull side panels is skyrocketing!
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: 70% of the outermost storm shutters have been damaged and are basically failing!
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: Also... multiple abnormal heat sources detected near the hull, energy amplitude approaching critical threshold!
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: Does this mean...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Yes. It

attributes.content: Ah, Dr. {@nickname}!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: How... can this be?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: No time to explain.;It

attributes.content: Alright... I got it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All hands, activate code red Catastrophe alert!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Evacuate all personnel on the first deck, bridge excluded. Gather all non-engineering personnel from the second to sixth levels in the central area for safety!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Central control, maintain minimum speed cruising...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Navigator, how long will this desert thunderstorm last?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: These sudden-onset storms usually pass within an hour or two...
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: It's hard to say for sure. Doctor? Earthspirit?
attributes.name: Navigator A

attributes.options: Earthspirit, your analysis.

attributes.content: Yes, Doctor.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: Mr. Pavel, the Doctor gave you the report I completed an hour ago.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: Multiple small cyclones within two kilometers...? This doesn't bode well!
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: This Catastrophe is no ordinary desert thunderstorm... we could be looking at a maximum strength windstorm!
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: Can I borrow one of the sensors on the bridge?
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: Of course. I should've seen it myself...
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: It's alright, Mr. Pavel. This is an extremely abnormal phenomenon and well beyond the scope of normal Catastrophe prediction. An experienced Catastrophe Messenger would have some trouble spotting all the signs in time.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: If not for the Doctor's assistance, I would've treated the outliers as errors and glossed over them.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.options: We still have time to move things in the right direction.;......;I

attributes.content: Doctor, Amiya, the small cyclones ahead are converging and intensifying.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: In other words, the core of the multi-cyclone vortex is about to generate.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: Once the core forms, I estimate the cyclone will reach two kilometers in diameter and last at least seven to eight hours.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: What happens if Rhodes Island maintains its speed as it approaches the core?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If we come into contact with the vortex, the ship's hull may collide with high-speed active Originium dust, roughly equivalent to the simultaneous detonation of hundreds of maximum-payload Originium bombs across the bulwark.
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: I'm sure you can guess how that might go for us.
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: Do we have enough time to change course?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can try...
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: The core of the windstorm changes directions very quickly, and can reach a maximum speed of nearly 1,000 kilometers per hour.
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: Then there's no point in us trying.
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: Amiya, even if we try a full speed retreat, if we get unlucky with the direction, Rhodes Island won't escape the storm.
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: Then it seems like the only thing we can do is stay put.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mr. Pavel, give me a potential damage assessment.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If we spend seven hours in a thunderstorm of a similar scale, the first to sixth decks will be damaged maybe 15%...
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: Of those, the first deck will take the hardest hits, and casualties are likely.
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: It'll be the biggest loss the ship takes in a year.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But, I don't see any options...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: There is a way.

attributes.content: Doctor?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: We won

attributes.content: Yes, if we have to stop in the wastelands, we could face other threats.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: We have another choice.;Since we can

attributes.content: Doctor, are you suggesting that we continue straight ahead?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That's out of the question, visibility is too low!
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: Even with assisted driving, I can't navigate. I'm from Sargon, plunging headfirst into a sandstorm like this is suicide!
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: I understand your concerns, Mr. Kamal.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But, I trust the Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, are you sure about leading Rhodes Island through the Catastrophe zone?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I need Earthspirit to keep calculating the real-time coordinates of the vortex.;Yes.;I need PRTS to help me calculate the energy amplitude of the Originium on the surface.

attributes.content: Good, please cooperate with the Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Calculating a safe route in such a short time sounds like a bad joke.
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: If anyone can do it, it's our Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I've heard stories of the battles and all... but operating the landship is nothing like field command!
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: I don't know about this... Of course, I don't doubt the Doctor's abilities, but I've never heard of this real-time calculation method...
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: It just might work...
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: Earthspirit, can you make sense of the Doctor's formulas?
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: But they feel a bit familiar.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: Right... I heard about a similar formula from some whiz kid a couple days ago, but the Doctor's version is more complicated and varied.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.options: I

attributes.content: Let's head forward then!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I

attributes.content: No, Doctor, that would be too inefficient.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rhodes Island only needs one commander right now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Okay, Doctor, go forward until you're at my position.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: From the moment I saw you appear on the bridge, I trusted that the situation would definitely turn around.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Attention, everyone on the bridge
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: From now on, I am transferring command of the Rhodes Island landship to Dr. {@nickname}!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Notify Closure and have her put all cabins into energy-saving mode!;All power to the engines!

attributes.content: Got it, Doctor!
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: Message from Closure: The engine is ready, and she wishes us 'good luck'...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There's nothing wrong with going a little crazy every now and then.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: If I knew I'd be sailing like this, I would've brought some booze.
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.options: Rhodes Island, all ahead full!

attributes.content: I'm getting a nosebleed from this speed!
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: That's because I elbowed your nose... Sorry, but the whole place is shaking so much I can't control my limbs.
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: Is the seismic damper malfunctioning?
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: Looks like it's not just my imagination - the whole ship's falling apart.
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: Earthspirit, you haven't taken your eyes off the screen at all...
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: Cyclone number two is continuing to move thirty degrees southeast, cyclone number three... cyclone number four...
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: Doctor, hold my hand!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I

attributes.content: Doctor, did I step on your foot...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Don

attributes.content: Are we shaking less?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Hard right, now!!

attributes.content: Haah... I didn't even notice that strong wind just now. If it caught us, there's no telling if we would've been able to stabilize the hull at this speed!
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: Did the downburst make contact with the ground?
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: Only two minutes until the core of the storm forms.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.options: Maintain current trajectory and keep moving forward!

attributes.content: Wait, I see the cyclone!
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: There's one on the left and another on the right!
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: We're surrounded. Rhodes Island is going to collide in just two or three more minutes!
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.options: Keep going.

attributes.content: It's impossible to avoid them! We don't have enough space to maneuver!
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.options: Trust me.

attributes.content: I'm trying real hard, Doctor!
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: But I don't trust myself so much!
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: Forget it, if Amiya's with you, I'm on board too. Even if I have to tie my hand to the steering handle, I'll keep pushing it forward until the very end!
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: I just regret agreeing to swap shifts with that stinky lad, George...
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: Seventy-five meters. Fifty meters. Thirty meters...
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: (Gulps nervously) I've never seen a Catastrophe-cyclone up close before...
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Amiya, are you afraid?;......;You

attributes.content: I'm a bit nervous, but I'm not afraid.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I am a little nervous. But rest assured, Doctor, I'm not afraid.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sorry, Doctor, I'm a bit nervous. But I'm not afraid.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We've been through times like this together before.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The closer we might be to despair, the bigger everyone's hopes are, the more incredible the outcome will be.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, this is what you taught me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Hope comes from the commitment to never give in, even at the bitter end.

attributes.content: Yes, Doctor, you once said the exact same words.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: 'Red alert, red alert...'
'Attention everyone, prepare for impact!'
Just like before, we'll get through this crisis together.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Yes, we survived back then.;Look.;I think my record

attributes.content: The wind is subsiding... and the color of the sky is changing too.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Report, Rhodes Island has left the Catastrophe zone!!
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: The damage to all deck levels is less than 5%, and nobody was injured!
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: Thank goodness...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: My nose hurtsssss... Pavel, do you know you hit my nose again?
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: So what if I did? We're alive, I say! Alive!
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: Fine, but you owe me a drink.
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: Whatever you want, it's on my tab. I almost made a big mistake.
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: Doctor, it's all thanks to you!
attributes.name: Navigator B

attributes.content: Absolutely brilliant calculations, Doctor.
attributes.name: Earthspirit

attributes.content: Doctor, is your command always so thrilling? Haha, I'd like to get another taste of that sometime!
attributes.name: Central Control Staff

attributes.content: Doctor, how in the world did you pull that off? It's like you've got prophetic Arts or something, suddenly showing up on the bridge right before we get hit by a Catastrophe!
attributes.name: Navigator A

attributes.options: To be fair, I was pretty anxious through that whole thing.;......;Shouldn

attributes.content: Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: Amiya hugs you suddenly, and you realize that the hands on your waist are squeezing you tighter than they were at any point during the storm.

attributes.content: Thank you... Thank you standing by my side.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Not half bad.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: I did what I had to do.;......;Thanks.

attributes.content: The relationship between the self-replication speed of Originium and the increase in energy you applied this knowledge to the calculation of wind-Catastrophe trajectories.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: You demonstrated similar abilities in the past, helping your colleagues at the time mitigate losses from Catastrophes. Some called you a Catastrophe expert.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: But we both know what you really specialize in.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: What do I specialize in?;......;Look, I really don

attributes.content: That formula... You still remember it.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: I didn

attributes.content: You created that formula yourself.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: You've recovered a lot of information about Originium and Catastrophes over the past month, and you left a lot of calculations in your notes.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Perhaps the sudden crisis dredged up the latent memories from deep inside your consciousness, or perhaps you reinvented it using the knowledge you left behind.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: The fact that you could recall this formula proves that you still retain a basic understanding of the nature of Originium.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: In other words, you've never forgotten your identity as a researcher of Originium.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: I want to continue this line of research.;This seems to be my duty.

attributes.content: You may see the study of Originium as your duty, but know that our actions should never be restricted by duty alone.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, what drives you to pursue the study of Originium so fervently?
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: Both you and Amiya have Oripathy.;The suffering caused by Originium scars our world.;I want to bring an end to this calamity.

attributes.content: I once heard an answer to this question.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: It was very similar to what you said today, but also completely different.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: The person who uttered those words had an instinctive desire to unravel truths unknown, and also worked hard to save lives.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: But sometimes, salvation also meant destruction that is what the same person told me.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Do you still harbor that same answer deep within your brain?
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: Does it still count as being there even if I don

attributes.content: Amiya said your performance on the bridge today was much like that of an actual 'prophet.'
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: I did my homework.;......;Why are you staring at me like that?

attributes.content: The rational part of me wants to believe in science.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: When the results of your first brain examination came back, I thought I saw some errors in the process, and so there was a second time, a third time... and even a seventh time.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: The rational part of me told me that repeating the same results three times was enough to prove that you weren't lying.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Without a shadow of a doubt, you really did lose a lot of your memories. You don't remember what you did to Theresa, and you forgot why you were standing here in the first place.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: All of this has caused a significant... dichotomy between you and the person I once knew.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: But just like I allowed you to do the seventh test, in this moment, I once again find myself doubting... Who exactly is standing in front of me?
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: How much of the past remains, and how much of you blooms anew?
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: You

attributes.content: Perhaps, I won't deny it. Dealing with you always has a tendency to sway my emotions.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: But this is also born of extreme rationality.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I hope you understand, there can be errors in our measurements. And in your case, I can no longer tolerate any errors.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I would like to apologize to you regarding this matter.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: But taking a better grasp of your memory recuperation will also have real benefits for your body.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: There
Setting aside your role as a doctor, do you want me to regain my memories?

attributes.content: Situations are rarely black and white... and the same is true of human emotions.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I've not concealed my hatred for you in the past, but... no matter how much I hate to admit it, there's something else there too.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: You want me doing everything I could before.;Do you miss the person you hate?;You

attributes.content: If it's only strength I needed, I believe that you are good enough as you are... Perhaps, you can do even better.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Do I... 'miss'...?
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: That word is far too simple. The languages of this world have developed over thousands of years, and yet I am still unable to choose the most suitable word to order my thoughts during the many moments I think about you.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Without a doubt, I seek that answer.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Ideally, I want to hear the truth from your mouth. But I will not give up looking for that truth in other ways.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Now, it's my turn to ask you.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, do you want your memories back?
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: I do.;I don

attributes.content: Your answer doesn't matter. I see your hesitation.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Once your memories come back, many of your questions will be answered. However, not every answer will satisfy you.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: You will know where all the emotions pouring into you come from, whether it is the hatred from me and W, the unconditional trust from Amiya, or... even further back.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Excess memories, intense emotions, will instantly flood your entire brain
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Trust me, what you will feel at that time will be far greater than exhaustion.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: What you should fear even more is, when the past finally catches up to you, you must decide.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: What if those memories are too strong and engulf all the hard work you've put in recently, and pull you back into the abyss that you failed to crawl out of over countless years?
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Once the current you is defeated, everything you've worked so hard to build will collapse, and your will may no longer be your own.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: So, let me ask you once more
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, are you ready?
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: If luck is on our side, you won't need to answer this question any time soon.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I want to thank you. Over the past month or so, you've shown me some new possibilities.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Especially today. I learned that you still remember the formula.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: It turns out, you and I are not the only ones preparing for that day.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I suspected this long ago, that home-use life functions restoration device was not supposed to have the defect of deleting one's memory
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: In particular, it's impossible to selectively delete the part of the brain most likely involved in decision-making, but still retaining the parts most meaningful to you.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}......
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: What I think is, she trusted you even more than I could fathom in the past.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: That being the case, we should continue to work hard.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Just as I've said countless times already, I will help you, as long as we continue to stand together.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: 7:43 P.M. \ Overcast
Rhodes Island Landship, Command Center
Professor, are you here?

attributes.options: Eyjafjalla? Come in.

attributes.content: Professor, they said you wanted to see me...
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.options: This is for you.

attributes.content: Is it about my application to become an operator...? Oh, it's been approved?
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: That's great news. Everyone said you and Miss Amiya would turn me down because of my condition.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.options: I convinced her.

attributes.content: I see, you even went out of your way to get it approved? Thank you...
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.options: The briefing you submitted this morning helped Rhodes Island through a crisis.

attributes.content: You mean... the Catastrophe this afternoon?
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: Professor, did you read my analysis?
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.options: Your Originium vein expansion observations were incredibly accurate.;You were able to predict a Catastrophe through an increase in Originium activation on the surface.

attributes.content: It was just a hunch.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: They said the density of Originium near the surface around here would be very low, but I saw the same situation in a volcano in southern Leithanien...
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: Even a small amount of Originium proliferates rapidly over a brief period when the conditions are right.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: Two days ago, after finishing my daily treatment, I was walking around the dorms as usual when I saw the approaching phenomenon from the dust samples on the porthole.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: In sandy terrain, a sudden burst in Originium energy will cause the ground temperature to rise rapidly, leading to a significant increase in the possibility of large-scale wind-Catastrophes.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: Um... I'm so sorry... I can go on and on about this stuff...
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.options: Please continue.

attributes.content: You've already seen the report, right?
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: Busy as you are, I never expected you'd read our random notes.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.options: I also read your thesis.;Your research is very interesting.;I

attributes.content: Professor, are you interested in my research?
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: Do mystical Originium Arts like that exist?
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: Ah... I understand, you were making a joke.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: If you're not too busy, I'd love to stay over and have a nice chat with you again.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.options: After I get some work done.;You

attributes.content: There are so many books on your desk...
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: Annals of the Great Yan Classics,' 'A Tower Without a Legend,' 'Columbia Judicial Observation Notes,' 'Conquest and Assimilation' ...Professor, are these the books you normally read?
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: Your interests are so diverse. It's nothing like the bookcases of the other professors I know.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.options: I think this one will interest you the most.

attributes.content: These are your... Catastrophe research notes?
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.options: Just something to read over.;Just some thoughts I jotted down.;Just a rough draft.

attributes.content: Thank you... Thank you so much! I'll study these thoroughly!
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: If I have any questions, may I come to talk to you?
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.options: Any time.;You

attributes.text: The young scholar clutches the notes you handed her tightly, lifts her head, and looks at you with conviction-filled eyes.

attributes.content: Professor... my life has been a series of wonderful surprises since coming to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: The stability of my Oripathy has given me a lot more confidence about my future, and people like you have given me the hope to keep moving forward.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: If you're working so hard, then what reason do any of us have to give up?
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: Professor.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: Thank you so much for leading Rhodes Island forward, and on into the future.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla
